front.title: Proxy MPLS Traffic Engineering Label Switched Path(LSP)

abstract.t: This document describes a method to setup MPLS TE proxy egress LSP which can help setup end-to-end LSP through stitching MPLS TE proxy egress LSP with BGP LSP in the Seamless MPLS network. The method is achieved by new Proxy Destination Object carried in RSVP-TE messages.
